subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
Cognate with {{och-l|子}} and {{och-l|崽}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=囝,兒,啊-after name or title,也-after name or title}}
Pronunciation 1 is a weak form of {{zh-l|囝|tr=kiáⁿ, káⁿ}}. ({{etyl|cmn|-}} and {{etyl|yue|-}} pronunciations in words borrowed from {{etyl|nan|-}} are from etymology 1.)
